name: styletoggle
title: Style Toggle
description: Style Toggle helps developers convert between CSS and JavaScript styles.
author: ignacio-gavilanes

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Convert Between Css and Js Styles
commands.description: Toggle between CSS and JavaScript style formats.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
